document.full_text: approximately 131,000 pounds of pizza products shipped to trader joe's stores have been voluntarily recalled because of a failure to declare wheat, a known allergen, on the finished product label, the department of agriculture said late on tuesday.
document.title: pizza recalled for undeclared allergen: usda
lines_and_colors: approximately 131,000 pounds of pizza products shipped to trader joe's stores have been voluntarily recalled because of a failure to declare wheat, a known allergen, on the finished product label, the department of agriculture said late on tuesday.
